description:
Slippery Secrets Feat 7
GeneralSkill
Source Core Rulebook pg. 266
Prerequisites master in Deception
You elude and evade attempts to uncover your true nature or intentions. When a spell or magical effect tries to read your mind, detect whether you are lying, or reveal your alignment, you can attempt a Deception check against the spell or effectâ€™s DC. If you succeed, the effect reveals nothing.
